amendment.description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to reduce the salary of Securities and Exchange Commission chairman Gary Gensler to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 252 (Roll no. 632).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 252 (Roll no. 632).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
